Hi All.
I Unzipped the ISO for OA ultimate 2 and the tried the patch on it according to the below instructions found in the Xtasy MS info document:
-----
Hello dear endusers ! As you may know Dead Or Alive Ultimate contains 2 dvds, but in fact they only differ from a few files so as we are smart we only packed dvd2 and made a ppf patch for you to recreate the .iso image of dvd1, for those of you who wanna burn it.
------
But unfortunately I cant make the patch work.
I have the iso in the same directory as the ppf application.
I applied the patch using the included application PPF o matic. (very quick it just blinks) and then gives a confirmation message that the patch is applied successfully.
It does “something” with the ISO as it changes Date and time for the file but nothing happens with the  SIZE of the Iso file, which indicates that the change patch failed.

 When I burn it its still just the iso for Ultimate 2!

I am obvioulsy doing something wrong? Do I need to change the name of the iso (its now r-daou1.iso) or something before applying the patch ?

Please help 
Regards /AceNorth

Detta är Dead or Alive Ultimate. Ultimate är originalet plus DOA 2 i kraftigt uppiffad version så tanka på.

För att få det att funka på HD:
Lägg in spelet och döp det till det ni vill att 2:an ska heta (tex. DOA 2 Ultimate) och sedan lägger ni in 1:an och döper det till tex. DOA 1 Ultimate. 

Här kommer patchen in. (Den följer med)
Man tar alla filerna 
(default.xbe, doa1.txt, Doa1.xbe och DOA2.xbe) 
och lägger in dom i DOA 1 Ultimate mappen I XBOXEN.  Alltså lägger du in filerna  i DOA 1 mappen efter att du lagt in Spelet två gånger på HDn.

Jag misstänker att om ni ska bränna spelen så är det samma sak, fast ni lägger in patch filerna i den ena ISOn innan ni bränner såklart.

Glöm bara inte Doa1.txt filen, utan den får man bara en massa DOA2 spel.

i know how you change this game to DOA1 or 2
Just change the NAME doa1.txt to doa2.txt
and then you start your game ! do not open the doa1.txt . just only change the doa1.txt to doa2.txt

This is both Dead or Alive 1 and 2. Just tested them and both works perfect!

Just upload the game to two different folders on your XBOX harddrive with Qwix (for example call them "Dead or Alive 1" and "Dead or Alive 2"). Now goto your harddrive with an FTP program and goto "Dead or Alive 1" and rename the doa2.txt to doa1.txt.

Happy playing =)
